content: Do 10 pushups
Drink a glass of water
Take 5 deep breaths
Stand up and walk around the room
Clear a small area on your desk
Water any plant in the house
Do 20 squats
Close eyes and mentally sing your favorite song
Look up, down, left, and right 10 times
Massage center of your palm
Name 5 items you can see, 4 you can touch, 3 you can hear, 2 you can smell, and 1 you can taste

content.title: Mental health
content.text: Watching porn can lead to anxiety, depression, and stress, as shown by research. It may also create dependence, reduce self-control, and harm mental health.

content.title: Marriage
content.text: Research shows that adults who watched porn in the past year were more likely to be divorced, more likely having an extramarital affair, and less likely to report being happy with their marriage or overall.

content.title: Pornhub hosting sex trafficking and rape videos
content.text:
There have been several shocking cases of sex trafficking and underage rape films that were hosted on Pornhub.

A 15-year-old girl who had been missing for a year was finally found after her mother was tipped off that her daughter was being featured on the site. More...

content.title: Cognitive and Emotional Impacts
content.text: Pornography has been linked to depression, aggression and impaired executive functioning.

content.title: Sexual violence
content.text: Pornography linked to unhealthy sexual beliefs, encouraging sexual violence, and damaging self-esteem.

content.title: Brain function
content.text: The negative effects of pornography include decreased prefrontal cortex gray matter, leading to addiction and impaired decision-making.

content.title: Erectile dysfunction
content.text: Pornography associated with erectile dysfunction, loss of control, and a negative impact on sexual well-being.

content.title: Just four weeks
content.text: Four weeks of abstinence may lead to various psychological improvements, including enhanced motivation, mood, and social behaviors.

content.title: Relationship Quality
content.text: Pornography use is linked to lower relationship satisfaction for both men and women.

content.title: Infidelity and divorce
content.text: Pornography consumption is associated with an increased likelihood of infidelity and divorce in relationships, for both men and women.

content.desc: A real tiger is someone who picks tiger pictures...
Speaking of which, I can crush a watermelon with my mouth.
You have to go to Japan someday...
The cutie looks at the cutie.
Just a reminder of how beautiful the world is.
Haha, I hope I made you smile.
Wow, you caught a golden fish! Wait, that not a fish...
Even in the dirt, you can choose to stay clean.
I am the girl that you've been looking for?
In times of need, I'll give you a paw.
Be a dog, don't be a mushroom.
Every arrow you shoot could be an airplane full of people...
Your inner kid counting on you.
Friendship.
You deserve to be free from addiction.
The most beautiful things are just the right combination of simple elements.
Do culture and art simply imitate life or they are able to transcend it?
Kirkjufell, Iceland. One of the best spots to view the Northern Lights.
Looks over matter or substance over style? Balance?

Water can become literally anything. It can flow or it can crash.
Be water, my friend.
A Genealogy of Technology and Power Since 1500

Totally usual monk and his cat reading together, france, 13th century.
What book do you want to read? And your cat?

Space nebula. Can something like that exist by mere circumstance
or it requires just a tiny touch of a will?
Thingvellir, Iceland.
Night in the woods, sky timelapse.
Unusual trees in New Zealand.
Voynich manuscript. Still a mystery of a kind.
Watermelon tourmaline slice.
How long ago was the last time you greeted the dawn?
Сaustic of light by glass. Try yourself!

(You can make your own page like this)

static.question: Do you agree with the quote? Why?

content: «I am not a product of my circumstances. I am a product of my decisions.» — Stephen Covey
«The only way out is through.» — Robert Frost
«Every moment of resistance to temptation is a victory.» — Frederick William Faber
«The secret of change is to focus all of your energy not on fighting the old, but on building the new.» — Socrates
«Addiction begins with the hope that something 'out there' can instantly fill up the emptiness inside.» — Jean Kilbourne
«Don’t judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.» — Robert Louis Stevenson
«What is often given free, proves to be the most costly.» — Takemura
«If all you have is a hammer, everything looks like a nail.» — Proverb
«None are more hopelessly enslaved than those who falsely believe they are free.» — Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
«Darkness cannot drive out darkness.» — Martin Luther King Jr.
«The definition of insanity is doing the same thing over and over again, but expecting different results.» — Albert Einstein
«It is our choices, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.» ― J.K. Rowling
«Certain things catch your eye, but pursue only those that capture the heart.» — Proverb
«Risk more than others think is safe. Dream more than others think is practical.» — Howard Schulz
«I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.» ― Thomas A. Edison
«It is not the man who has too little, but the man who craves more, that is poor.» — Seneca
«No man is free who is not master of himself.» — Epictetus
«Freedom is slavery.» — George Orwell, 1984
«Desires are never satiated by enjoyment. Like fire, they grow when gratified.» — Bhagavat Gita
«If you can quit for a day, you can quit for a lifetime.» — Benjamin Alire Sáenz
«Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.» — C.S. Lewis
«You don’t have to see the whole staircase, just a next step.» — Martin Luther King Jr.

static.p: Attempt to identify the trigger that contributed to the formation of the desire

Сlose friend wants to support you.
Imagine what words could have actually helped you right now?

static.h1: Visualize one future moment that you wish to have together with your wife

static.textMain:
You asked ClearMind extension to block

The desire you are experiencing is perfectly normal in itself, but should we let the compulsive behavior of addiction to take over?

Together we can get over it!
static.textSecondary: You asked ClearMind extension to block

static.mainHeaderResult: Your urge strength changed from to

static.p: Congratulations, sir! Here is some powerful artifact to help in your journey!

static.p1:
ClearMind is a browser extension that helps overcome porn addiction.

We created it because we believe that the overabundance of pornography in the digital space is one of the most serious problems of our time, negatively affecting everyone, especially young people.

Unlike other extensions, ClearMind employs principles of CBT, gamification, and attention management to suppress the desire rather than mechanically block access to websites.

What started as a personal project became something we would be happy sharing with everyone.
static.p3: We sincerely hope it will help you on your journey!
static.p5: Send an inspiring message from a moment of peace to your future self at its darkest hour. All the data stored offline.
